00020 void imuCB(const sensor_msgs::ImuConstPtr message)
00021 {
00022         ROS_INFO_STREAM("Recived IMU Message:\n Frame ID: "<<message->header.frame_id
00023                                                   <<"\n Stamp: "<<message->header.stamp
00024                                                   <<"\n Linear:\n"<<message->linear_acceleration
00025                                                   <<"\n Angular:\n"<<message->angular_velocity);
00026 }
00027 
00028 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00029 {
00030         ros::init(argc, argv, "kvh_test_node");
00031         ros::NodeHandle nh;
00032 
00033         ros::Subscriber imu_sub = nh.subscribe("kvh/imu", 10, imuCB);
00034         ros::spin();
00035 }
